title: Lake Meredith National Recreation Area: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       What's the Best Way to Stay Connected? Lake Meredith National Recreation Area provides a few different ways for you to stay connected to what is happening in the park. These options allow you to choose how you want to be informed, and how often you want to be informed.  _________________________________________________________________________ News Releases  Visit our News Releases page to view the latest news and events from Lake Meredith.  Facebook  "Like" Lake Meredith National Recreation Area on Facebook and get more than just News Releases delivered to your personal News Feed in Facebook. We share exciting content and events as they happen. Start following today!   Â    NOTICE: National Park Service News Release New Firearms Law
